instruction: Generate a field report given some description.
input: Observed 4 White-tailed deer in a cornfield.
output: On the afternoon of August 29th, I observed 4 White-tailed deer in a cornfield from a distance of 300 yards. The deer were grazing on the corn stalks, with an occasional visit from one of the local crows. The air temperature was 80°F with light winds, and visibility was good. All the deer appeared in good health. I have included a photograph of the scene in the attached file.
